alert.note: Alert for Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:02PM CDT until May 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR YORK AND POLK COUNTIES... At 601 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Platte Center to 7 miles west of Schuyler to David City to near Ulysses to near Utica, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... York, Stromsburg, Osceola, Shelby, McCool Junction, Waco, Benedict, Gresham and Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 349 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
